mapper.select:
select distinct * from seller s join auth a on s.id = a.id
where not s.id in (select s.id from seller s join auth a on s.id = a.id where auth = "ROLE_MANAGER") and s.seller_state = '1'
select distinct * from seller s left join auth a on s.id = a.id where auth = 'ROLE_MANAGER' or s.seller_state = '0' order by seller_code desc
mapper.insert:
select concat(#{lv2con},lpad(max(substr(category_code,2,4))+1,4,"0")) as category_code, concat(#{lv2con},lpad(max(substr(lv2code,2,3))+1,2,"0")) as lv2code from category where lv1= #{lv1}
insert into category(lv2,lv2code,lv1,category_code,lv3) values(#{lv2},#{lv2code},#{lv1},#{category_code},#{lv3})
